transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello, Namaskar sir, Shahnawaz baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se.
Customer: Bolo bolo sir.
Executive: Aur bataiye kaise hai aap?
Customer: Bas badhiya. Aap batao. Zaroor sir. Badhiya hai sir. Service aap use nahi kar rahe ho 26 October ke baad se.
Customer: Service mein lead provide nahi ho rahi hai sir ji.
Executive: Sir maine dekho abhi ek whatsapp pe bhi share kiya hoga ye 13 ghanta 12 ghanta ye aap se jo miss ho ja rahi hai wahi hai. Aur ek baar main aapke catalog pe bhi dekh raha hu. Aap daily basis aap 26 October ke baad se aapne lead ya aapko catalog hi open nahi kiya hai sir.
Customer: Par lead provide hi nahi ho rahi hai to catalog kaise open karega?
Executive: Sir ye dekho ye hota hai live rehta hai na sir ye ki aapko daily basis se by lead aati hai live lead jo bhi IndiaMART pe post hoti hai aisa to hai nahi pre generated hai ki jis time aap use karo usi time sare aapko mil jaye fir uske baad free ho jao. Aisa nahi hai. Ya aapke ek matlab ho sakta hai abhi aapko char by lead aa jaye jisme aapke deal achi ho jaye. Ho sakta hai ye aapko sham ko aa jaye ya fir dopahar mein kabhi bhi post hoti hai sir. To aap isme bhi yaha pe aap ek time single time baithte ho jaise man lijiye aap all India ke bhi main baat karu. To is 60 liter 20 liter ye sab to aa hi raha hai. Sath hi mein agar aap ye dekhoge aap ek aaya tha Rajmoti ground nut ka sir 3000 kg ka.
Hmm. 5 se 10 lakh ye bhi aapke catalog pe hi hai but hat gaya hai aap abhi bhi search karoge Visnagar Gujarat mein ye aapko available hai ye yaha pe. Visnagar Gujarat ka hai. Lead provide karo sir ji. Wo hai na Andhra ko Andhra Pradesh wale ko Bengaluru walo ko maine baat ki thi ek do ko. Ji. Wo sir le nahi rahe aur faltu ki baat karke kaat de rahe hai call. Kuch response mil nahi raha hai yaar. Dekho sir aapko aapne bataya tha ki 1 lakh liter ki lead hai 1 crore ke above ka wo order value hai to uska to kuch response hi nahi aaya maine do baar call kiya usko. Sir ek cheez aur main aapko bata du ki aapko jo consume kar rahe ho jaise aap apne se jo consume kar rahe ho aur uske usme jab consume kar rahe ho usme jyadatar aapka chances aap 24 ghante 48 ghante matlab 14% aapka first week mein matlab last jo week gujra usme 14% aap zero to four hours matlab fresh by lead consume kar rahe ho baki 85% aap by lead 24 se 48 ghante wali kar rahe ho aapko bhi pata hai ki limited by lead hai ground nut oil ki aur aapko main bata du ki ek by lead agar post hoti hai to usme panch seller hote hain jo use consume kar pate hain sir. Aur aise situation mein aap kya kar rahe ho aap 48 ghante 24 ghante ke baad consume kar rahe ho to wo already char seller se baat kar chuka rehta hai sir. To char seller se baat kar chuka fir wo aapse aap rate jo batate ho wo use usko lagta hai ki isme nahi ho sakta isliye hum aapko bar bar suggest yahi karte hain ki aap fresh by lead consume kijiye sir. Kyunki freshly aati hai aur daily basis pe aati hai abhi main aapke catalog pe hi hu aap calls wagera aap hi dekhte ho?
Hmm. Ji. Calls bhi to aayi hai teen abhi tak 9 din mein. To calls kaise aa rahi hai aur usme miss bhi ho gayi hai sir. Kitni miss hui? Do miss hui hai call abhi ek hafte mein. Aap hi pura catalog aap hi handle. Haan haan main hi handle karta hu. Aap hi handle karte ho na sir aap agar catalog mein jaoge to aapko saaf dikhega ki aapne jyada filtered ground nut oil add kiya hua hai matlab jyada by lead aap uski consume kar rahe ho plus ground nut oil ke sath sirf ground nut oil ka agar main baat karu to isme bhi agar aap by lead chaho to aapko every time post hoti hai jaise aap chote amount ke jaise aapne 200 rupay ke aap order ji hamara ground nut oil ka manufacturing hai theek hai wo usko wo to keh dega ki hume cold process chahiye ya fir refined chahiye usko manane ki koshish kare to nahi idhar ek ek ek by lead dekho maine abhi aapko bataya abhi main call pe hi hu ji maine ek by lead share kiya aapke whatsapp pe do by lead jo dusre wali hai na aap usse baat kijiye sirf teen minute pehle aaya hua hai sir aap ek baar consume karke isse baat kijiye definitely aapka ho sakta aise aap consume karoge na sir jaise actively aapko jab free time milta hai aap open karte ho fir dekho kon si fresh by lead aayi hai aap use consume karo aap usse baat karo usme aapko deal close hone ke jyada chances rehte hain sir aap consume hi kar rahe ho 24 se 48 ghante purani wale to usme to kahan se chances milenge sir jyada ke. Okay sir. Theek hai maine aapko share kiya hua hai aap ek baar baat kijiye aur baat karke mujhe whatsapp pe ek baar batayiyega kya feedback raha sir iska theek hai. Okay. Theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving enough buyleads.

- Customer says calls are not responsive.



Resolution:

- Executive shared tips to get fresh buyleads.

- Executive shared two new buyleads on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will contact the new buyleads.

- Customer will share feedback on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, groundnut oil, subscription
